response: "datenschutz ist wichtig! 🚫💻 es ist alarmierend, wie viel persönliche informationen aujourd' hinge given werden without our consent. 🤷‍♂️👀 did you know that companies are collecting our data and using it for their own purposes? 😱🤯 it's time to take control of our digital footprint and protect our privacy! 🔒🛡️ #datenschutz #privatsphäre #digitalerfußabdruck"
